FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: Ambidexterity is common among kithkin. The thoughtweft links the minds of the left- and right-handed, giving each the knack of the other.

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Knight creatures you control have double strike.

STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: if FilteredCard() ~= nil then local characteristics = FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics() if characteristics ~= nil then characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_DOUBLE_STRIKE, 1 ) end end
